Topic.Title: Does Anyone Want to Make a Game with Me?

Posts.EditableText: I have made one complete game and am currently working on some others, however, I grow bored sometimes because I don't have any kind of following or small/active community to share my incomplete games with. I would like to make a game (whether it be new or based on something you or I have already started) and work on it together with someone else. I can even just make a game based on an idea you have but aren't sure how to make a game out of. I enjoy making the text adventure games much more, but I can also create Gamebook adventures as well. Let me know if you are interested in any of this.
Posts.HTML: I have made one complete game and am currently working on some others, however, I grow bored sometimes because I don't have any kind of following or small/active community to share my incomplete games with. Let me know if you are interested in any of this.

Posts.EditableText:
I don't know. Not everything can be free. But I have a game that needs working on. I would do it myself, and I tried several times, but I can't use the downloaded Quest, and so far I can only use the online version.
I'm trying to make a Pokémon-based RPG. The first thing I need is just the conversation in the beginning, and then maybe the combat. I could do the rest on my own.

There's some guys on here looking for developers too. http://textadventures.co.uk/forum/general/topic/dh0afjdryucfkztdnnyshq/looking-for-designers
This guy needs test players. http://textadventures.co.uk/forum/games/topic/t4jdcizyhkylpeuaja9buw/two-weeks-away-from-finishing-surreal-need-test-players
(this too) http://textadventures.co.uk/forum/games/topic/xohq3txu-uwjvlt1wrpr2q/sister-location-the-text-adventure-beta-testers-needed

Posts.EditableText: I mean, I guess I'm free for game testing or other small things. But this site doesn't really have pm's. or anything. It's best just to post a link to your game on here.

Posts.EditableText:
I'd like to make mine more fun if you think you'd be down with that? I'm happy with the layout, it's in Gamebook currently although I think that Text might be better for it (I'm too intimidated by it... as a newb)... Let me know if you would like to collaborate and expand on what I have.
Played your Beginners Guide to Interactive Fiction and like your humour so figure you might be a good person to reach out to
http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/dh4tgm-u2uu5izam4uvzma/thief-the-text-project
